Package game.levels

Class GameLevel

  • java.lang.Object
    • city.cs.engine.World
      • game.levels.GameLevel
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LevelDebug, LevelOne, LevelThree, LevelTwo, NullLevel
    public abstract class GameLevel
extends city.cs.engine.World
    GameLevel is the template for the level classes.

    • Method Detail

      • populate

        public void populate​(Game game)
        Creates a new player if none has been created before, and initialises their position as well as that of the ground and the bone. It also adds collision handlers.
        Parameters:
        game - The main Game object.

      • startPosition

        public abstract org.jbox2d.common.Vec2 startPosition()
        The start position implementation of the player character.
        Returns:
        A 2D vector with position information.

        Returns:
